comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Wow! -- who knew? (I didn't ;-) I wondered what it sounded like, and found this short recording.

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Thanks for the link, Pixel Wrangler. Audio for Florida folk musicians is also available at the Florida Memory Web site. For a clip of Nikitas Tsimouris playing a tsambouna, you can go to www.floridamemory.com/Collections/folklife/sound_greek.cfm .
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Thanks! Your audio files are better than what I supplied. BTW, I had no idea the depth of your collection ... audio files, films, videos, and tens of thousands of papers and documents dating back to the 1800's. (I may still have little idea ;-)
